description: Enable AI agents to query and manage cloud-connected data sources using SQL, metadata introspection, and stored procedures. Integrate with AI workflows to enhance data-driven decision making.

host.description: Host address if using HTTP/SSE transport

port.description: Port number if using HTTP/SSE transport

capabilities.name: queryData
capabilities.description: Execute SQL queries against connected data sources and retrieve results

capabilities.name: execData
capabilities.description: Execute stored procedures against connected data sources

capabilities.name: getCatalogs
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of available connections from CData Connect Cloud.  The connection names should be used as catalog names in other tools and in any queries to CData Connect Cloud. Use the `getSchemas` tool to get a list of available schemas for a specific catalog.

capabilities.name: getColumns
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of available database columns from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

capabilities.name: getExportedKeys
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of foreign key relationships from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

capabilities.name: getImportedKeys
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of foreign key relationships from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

capabilities.name: getIndexes
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of indexes from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

capabilities.name: getPrimaryKeys
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of primary keys from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

capabilities.name: getProcedureParameters
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of stored procedure parameters from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and procedure

capabilities.name: getProcedures
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of stored procedures from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog and schema

capabilities.name: getSchemas
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of available database schemas from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog.  Use the `getTables` tool to get a list of available tables for a specific catalog and schema.

capabilities.name: getTables
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of available database tables from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog and schema.  Use the `getColumns` tool to get a list of available columns for a specific table.
